Package imagingbook.lib.ij

Class RoiUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.ij.RoiUtils
  • public class RoiUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines static ROI-related utility methods to interface with ImageJ.

      RoiUtils()

      static Pnt2d[] getPolygonPointsFloat​(ij.gui.Roi roi)
      Retrieves the outline of the specified ROI as an array of Pnt2d points with int coordinates.

      Retrieves the outline of the specified ROI as an array of Pnt2d points with int coordinates.
      static ij.gui.Overlay join​(ij.gui.Overlay olyA, ij.gui.Overlay olyB)
      Returns a new overlay produced by joining two existing overlays, which remain unchanged.

      • RoiUtils

        public RoiUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • getPolygonPointsInts

        public static Pnt2d[] getPolygonPointsInts​(ij.gui.Roi roi)
        Retrieves the outline of the specified ROI as an array of Pnt2d points with int coordinates. Note that unless the ROI is of type PolygonRoi or PointRoi only the corner points of the bounding box are returned. Interpolated contour points are returned for a instance of OvalRoi.
        Parameters:
        roi - the ROI
        Returns:
        the ROI's polygon coordinates

      • getPolygonPointsFloat

        public static Pnt2d[] getPolygonPointsFloat​(ij.gui.Roi roi)
        Retrieves the outline of the specified ROI as an array of Pnt2d points with int coordinates. Note that unless the ROI is of type PolygonRoi or PointRoi only the corner points of the bounding box are returned. Interpolated contour points are returned for a instance of OvalRoi.
        Parameters:
        roi - the ROI
        Returns:
        the ROI's polygon coordinates

      • join

        public static ij.gui.Overlay join​(ij.gui.Overlay olyA,
                                  ij.gui.Overlay olyB)
        Returns a new overlay produced by joining two existing overlays, which remain unchanged. All involved ROIs are cloned.
        Parameters:
        olyA - the first overlay
        olyB - the second overlay
        Returns:
        the new overlay
